tweet: JUST IN: The Labor-HHS-Education subcommittee has approved its Fiscal Year 2020 bill, which includes $189.8 billion in discretionary funding, sending it to the full House Appropriations Committee for markup. Learn more about the bill →  https://appropriations.house.gov/news/press-releases/appropriations-subcommittee-approves-fiscal-year-2020-labor-hhs-education … pic.twitter.com/M4wnaaTdwt

From Chairwoman @NitaLowey's opening statement at the FY2020 Labor-HHS-Education subcommittee markup: "After decades of inaction, this bill would finally provide a total of $50 million to CDC and NIH for evidence-based research on firearm injury prevention." pic.twitter.com/kd0cvGt0rP

From Chairwoman @RosaDeLauro's opening statement at the FY2020 Labor-HHS-Education subcommittee markup: "I will also note that we rejected the administration’s proposal to eliminate federal funding of the Special Olympics. Instead, we recommend a $3.5 million increase." pic.twitter.com/nVXVNY7fbl

At 4pm, the Labor-HHS-Education subcommittee will mark up their draft Fiscal Year 2020 bill. 

Learn more about the bill from this thread by Chairwoman @rosadelauro ⤵️ https://twitter.com/rosadelauro/status/1122984769460031493 …

Chairwoman @NitaLowey: This bill honors our commitment to the men and women in our armed services, to our veterans, and to the tens of thousands of military families who sacrifice every day for our nation."

NEW: MilCon-VA Chairwoman @RepDWStweets releases the FY2020 draft bill text: "This year’s funding bill makes tremendous investments in our veterans & military families...& soundly rejects President Trump’s attempt to steal funds from our armed services"  https://appropriations.house.gov/news/press-releases/appropriations-committee-releases-fiscal-year-2020-military-construction … pic.twitter.com/uPKMPPaiS2

Chairwoman @NitaLowey on the Legislative Branch bill: "This bill reverses a trend of recent years that prioritized property over people. The investments we are making are critical...to maintaining and developing a workforce of talented professionals."
